website_summaries.verdict: Basic mouthguard with no coloring offered in a 2-pack at a low price.
pros: Includes a thick base to prevent shock to the mouth
Consists of high-quality materials with no BPA or latex
Clear color appeals to some who may have sensitivity to certain dyes
Thin enough to fit comfortably and allow easy breathing while working out
cons: May be too large to fit mouths of some kids, even after molding

customer_reviews.title: Absorbs impact well, we’re happy with the purchase 👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price, even comes with a ventilated case 👍🏽 We used them for light sparring, stayed in my mouth well and I could talk with it on without worrying about falling off. Check out our full review on YouTube at Weak Endz Barbell Club channel 🥊
customer_reviews.author: Weak Endz Barbell Club

customer_reviews.title: Best Mouth Guard For Braces!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my 13yo daughter who plays AAU basketball and wears braces. I decided to try these as a cheaper alternative to her normal LiteBite mouth guard, and surprisingly these are WAY better! This mouth guard molded to her braces better which provides a full coverage over her teeth, but still allows her to speak normal. It fits very comfortable and you can barely tell she's wearing it. She will definitely be using these from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Shawntori C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product!!! It fits great and is more comfortable than the one from my dentist. I made a top and bottom impression of my teeth. I did bite down for the bottom set because I didn't want my tongue pushing up towards my top teeth. This way my tongue stays behind the guard. I held the the sides up with my fingers after coming out of the hot water to keep it elongated, reaching the teeth in the back. Clear, sturdy and included information on how to care for your guard after making it. Keeps me from clenching all night and no headaches. Thanks so much.
customer_reviews.author: Katokwe

customer_reviews.title: Small Mouths: cut in half and melt sharp edges for four guards instead of two!
customer_reviews.text: even after fitting the size was a bit bit in my mouth and the corners were sharp. BUT, I had a second one, cut it in half and shaped it. I melted the sharp corners off and it fits well. I basically melted it extra long so I could mold the half piece to my bottom and top teeth. I found this better than the name brand crest strip for the fact that I could cut it in two and mold it so well to my teeth. I will be purchasing this again when I need new ones.
customer_reviews.author: Emmy D.

customer_reviews.title: hands down the best mouthguard I've used
customer_reviews.text: This mouthguard is, hands down the best mouthguard I've used. It fits and mold around your teeth perfectly. You can talk, breathe and drink with this mouthguard in perfectly! The only downside is that you have to be REALLY careful when you mold the guard. The slightest mistake on the molding process can render the mouthguard useless. But that's ONLY so that the guard can mold to your teeth for a precise fit so you can breathe and talk easily.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mouth guard. One of the best I've utilized by far. Also inexpensive. I recommend it for any sport. The only thing I wouldn't recommend is for football since it doesn't have the belt to attach to the helmet. But if that's not a problem for you, then this one is perfect. Just follow the instructions and you will have probably he best mouthguard you tried before.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey A.

customer_reviews.title: OK  FOR SPORTS BUT,.... "AGGRESSIVE NIGHT TEETH GRINDERS" BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: These guards might be ok for sports, but in my case, I am an aggressive night teeth grinder, after I began to use this guard I noticed a very "Slight Bitter" after-taste in the mornings. When I got ready to rinse it at night before use, I began to notice a dry white residue. I looked at the residue under a scientific microscope and found out what I suspected they were loose PLASTIC particles!....needless to say, I don't care what kid of plastic it is, swallowing it can't be good for my health...
customer_reviews.author: ARKAS

customer_reviews.title: Seemed to work just fine. I may trim the pallet a bit
customer_reviews.text: Didn't really follow the directions, just put water in a mug in the microwave for 1.5 minutes took it out and it was already soft and kinda following on itself. It wasn't too hot, so I just put it in my mouth and molded it. Seemed to work just fine. I may trim the pallet a bit. Not sure, I'll decide after my first bjj class.
customer_reviews.author: Darren V

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it. I've molded many a mouth guard, but these ones were a huge pain. The sides are very high so if you have small teeth, the inner side walls go too high and go over your palate. Mine came out looking like a retainer, not covering my back molars, and sliding off despite best fitting efforts.
customer_reviews.author: SPS

customer_reviews.title: easy and functional
customer_reviews.text: My daughter lost her professionally made mouth guard for softball and we needed something quick to take it's place. She has a small mouth and refuses to wear the bulky ones. We ordered this and got it in two days. She molded it to her teeth and liked the way it fit. I'm sure it does not offer the protection of the bulkier mouthpieces but it is better than nothing at all.
customer_reviews.author: L Felts

customer_reviews.title: He's happy with it and I have had several other mom's ...
customer_reviews.text: My son plays baseball and some of the other players were using mouth guards. Seems a bit odd in baseball, but when he asked for one - he plays 3rd base and pitches, I opted for the clear... He's happy with it and I have had several other mom's ask where to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Way better than the basic drug store options
customer_reviews.text: After the dentist told me I needed a mouth guard and tried to sell me theirs for $500+ I went to the local drug store and bought one. It was awful. I replaced it with this one. It was 100x better. It came in a two pack, was less expensive and came with a nice case. They are able to be molded on both top and bottom of the bite, so it was far more comfortable than the previous one (that only let you mold from the top of the bite). I have worn it nightly for months and it has held up well. It stays in my mouth comfortably and has held up well to my nightly teeth grinding!
customer_reviews.author: Christina & Eric

customer_reviews.title: I bought mine open box discount, but one mouthpiece had been used.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how Amazon Warehouse could not plainly see that one of the mouthguards was unwrapped and had been used. There are teeth marks on one side, smears and cracking, where someone clearly had it in their mouth. Really seriously gross and extremely hazardous. I opened the package, held it and thought it looked strange before I figured it out and was in total shock. How would Amazon feel if a child opened the package and now has Covid19 from saliva. What better way to contract it than holding a used mouthguard in your hands?
customer_reviews.author: Phanthidan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Mouth Guard.
customer_reviews.text: Super great mouthguard. I use it every week, for the last couple of months for floor hockey. If you follow the instructions the fit is spot on. It comes with two molds which is nice because having never used a mouth guard before my first fit was a little loose. My second mold came out perfect and was a nice, snug fit. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a mouth guard. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Good protection, although a little bulky (and only for the top teeth)
customer_reviews.text: Seems to provide solid protection for the top teeth (caveat: we fortunately haven't put this to the test yet). This is molded to stay on your upper teeth, it won't fall out while you're playing Pros: * Provides protection for your teeth * Great price point * Can be easily custom molded * 2 pack is great, though there is only one case Cons: * It's quite bulky, not impossible to talk, but definitely pretty tough * Your lower teeth are technically a bit unprotected, but the guard should cover your upper teeth as well.
customer_reviews.author: Janeee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I recently got my braces off, so I wanted to get a good mouthguard for basketball. I first tried a much thicker one (shock doctor), but it was a pain. It wouldn't stay in and had sharp edges that would rub my mouth raw because I had to constantly take it out and put it back in to breathe clearly. It was also nearly impossible to communicate while wearing it. The sparkling white smiles guard was perfect! It stays in, I can breath perfectly, and I have no problem communicating. It was an easy boil and bite fitting. AND, it came with TWO guards. Couldn't be happier with this product. I will be a return customer. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kara Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic mouth guard
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic mouth guard!!! I purchased this for my son who plays lacrosse. He's been going thru mouth guards since age 6 and now 14... I've purchased all the latest and greatest with max air flow by Nike and Shock Doctor and even the Sisu. Hands down this is my son's favorite. It molds to your teeth and is still soft when you bite down unlike some of the other brands. Plus you get a mouth guard a WAY better discount. Don't pay for the name brand, believe me, buy this mouth guard and follow the instruction on how to fit it... money well spent!!!!!!! LAX Dad
customer_reviews.author: James Olmstead

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fit!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't buy this for sports, but as a night guard. I had bought one that was listed for that purpose which fit horribly and I couldn't return so I bought these hoping at least a two pack would give me a chance to make adjustments. I got this one fitted very good on the first try so I have my other one put up for a later date it fits great! Totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nana P.

customer_reviews.title: They shrink a lot in boiling water
customer_reviews.text: They shrunk considerably when boiling. Do not cut too much off to size them prior to boiling or you'll have nothing left. They shrink to almost half the size.
customer_reviews.author: melissa gangi

customer_reviews.title: Great mouthguard for weightlifting
customer_reviews.text: I got these to wear while weightlifting so I don’t grind my teeth and they do job beautifully. I can breathe well with it in my mouth. Making the impression of my teeth worked great, I found I had let it cool a tad too much from the boiling water the first time so I dunked it back in for a few seconds and tried again and got a great fitting. That it came with two mouthguards is pretty awesome too, I’ll probably give the other one to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Usman Siddiqi

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Initially we had a problem cause they only sent me 1 of the 2 mouthpieces. After making it right, they were a great purchase. We followed the directions to the T and molded perfectly. There were individual teeth impressions and great retention. Mouthpieces do not move once in mouth with no problem of them trying to fall out while he talks and yells.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Molds well to the shape of your teeth and is snug enough to still be able to talk
customer_reviews.text: I've bought a few of these for my eleven year old son to use for basketball. We have tried a few other brands that have been too bulky and it made it difficult to communicate with teammates on the court. He doesn't have that issue with these. We've needed to buy a few more more due to him losing them and new teeth coming in. The instructions are easy to follow and get a good snug fit. We did a test fit and trimmed the length before heating it up in the hot water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have for soccer goalies
customer_reviews.text: My son is a goalie and had a collision in the soccer goal with another player in his jaw and chipped off a chunk of tooth. After a trip to the ER dentist I ordered these. They molded well and give him that needed protection without being to bulky. He can still talk in the goal and his teammates can understand him, which was very important.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and difficult
customer_reviews.text: Followed the instructions to a T. Couldn’t get the thing to mould to my teeth. Burned my gums. It’s too big for my mouth, even trimmed down, and when I tried to adjust it after “moulding”, it stopped sticking in place and came loose and I almost choked. I have a spare, since this came with two, so I’ll try it again, but I’m really not pleased so far and I threw the first one away.
customer_reviews.author: M. D. Roberg

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these for my husband who was havi g a bite issue after a bridge was put in. He was having a very hard time sleeping since his bite was so off. We thought we would try this until his permanent bridge was complete. It worked like a charm! They were very easy to conform to the mouth following the instructions. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: C-leg Runner

customer_reviews.title: Even an 11 year old can do it!
customer_reviews.text: Grandson, with some help from his dad. fabricated his own soccer mouth guard. And he even has a spare in case he, like most every 11 year old on the planet would, misplaces it; He reports it is comfortable to add, and he can communicate with his team mates during a game.
customer_reviews.author: Laurence Schiffman

customer_reviews.title: Chipped 3 teeth
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately after years of football and always taking hits I have to say that this mouth guard is not our favorite. We liked the mouth guard until he chipped 3 teeth after a tackle yesterday. Needless to say we won’t be using this brand again. Back to shock doctor.
customer_reviews.author: Amie Redko

customer_reviews.title: my 5 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old son did not like the mouthguard that came with his Taekwondo sparring gear, so I bought this one. I cut the back sides off a bit and then cut a bit off of the top line to fit his mouth. Molded it and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Lanakii

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit an 11 y.o. boy very well.
customer_reviews.text: My son finds it hard to wear this for baseball. He also plays tackle football so he is used to mouthguards. This is not as easy to wear as the product claimed to be. He has worn it twice since he cannot speak with it in his mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to mold to my teeth. I wish I would have trimmed a little bit off of the top edge, as it goes up really high on my gums. I feel like I have an average size mouth. Works great though! I sent the 2nd one to my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Best mouthguard
customer_reviews.text: Best mouthguard that I ever bought for my son, and the price is reasonable. Better than those mouthguard with paint on them that comes off eventually while in your child's mouth, and cost two to three times as much. My son says it is the most comfortable mouthguard he has had. Very easy to mold or shape. Just use the microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M.

customer_reviews.title: EH?
customer_reviews.text: I took the advise of the reviewers and bought it. I had followed the instructions to a tee with the help of another. As I molded the piece, it folded over on one side. I also had to cut some of it-several times-to fit my mouth. Luckily there's two!!
customer_reviews.author: Susie Kang

customer_reviews.title: Better than I hoped even!
customer_reviews.text: Appreciated the detailed instructions on how to make the fit. It was easy to do. I was concerned about being able to use a night guard and it has turned out to be much easier than expected. I'm falling asleep and keeping it in my mouth! Great solution to protect my teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Ever Healthier

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend uses these as a mouth guard at night to keep him from grinding his teeth. While he eventually grinds all the way through them (after a few months), the price value makes them worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use mouth guard
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for nighttime use - my hygienist said I grind my teeth. The directions for fitting were simple and easy to follow. It is comfortable and has no discernable taste. Easy to clean Comes with a nice case.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Arno

customer_reviews.title: Melted mess
customer_reviews.text: Carefully following the well written directions still resulted in an unusable melted mess. They ship with two mouth guards and a nice case. Presumably the two mouth guards are to allow a 2nd opportunity to get it right. The case is nice and will be filled with a different mouth guard.
customer_reviews.author: K B

customer_reviews.title: Good for people that don't grind more so.
customer_reviews.text: These are not the thickest guards you will use. Some may prefer that. I would prefer more cushion for my grinding. That said they are tasteless and mold easily. Added the 5th star after using for a few months consecutively. Hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Joe DMann

customer_reviews.title: First mouth guard I can sleep with
customer_reviews.text: All other mouth guards severely blocked breathing, didn't stay in place, and were uncomfortable. This one fits as well as the $75 version you get from the dentist. Recommend for teeth grinders and teeth whitening fanatics.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great mouth guard for wrestlers
customer_reviews.text: We’ve spent upwards of $200 on a custom set of mouth guards from the dentist but when you have kids that wrestle all year long, all over the country/world, you need more than one set. This is why we love the $12 do-it-yourself version by Teeth Armour. Great product and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great product - very easy to use and better than the "generic" guards from the store.
customer_reviews.text: These mouth guards are easy to form fit, if you carefully follow the directions, and fit much better than the generic ones you can buy from most sports stores. My son plays goalie in soccer and got kicked in the face last year - since then he wears a mouth guard, so we have tried different guards. This one fits the best and allows him to talk to his team on the field much better than other guards. I will continue to purchase these for seasons to come.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Plath

customer_reviews.title: Molds Well - Much better buy than Sporting Goods Store
customer_reviews.text: High quality mouth guard. I liked that there were two in the pack and it came with a hard plastic case. The guards sold at sporting goods stores are WAY too overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: A. Levenson

customer_reviews.title: this mouth guard does not have a helmut tether
customer_reviews.text: My son used the mouth guard once and it fell out of his mouth and he lost it. Did not have a tether to the helmut. He said it was comfortable but we won't buy again because it did not stay put. When he removed it as shifts changed it did not stay in the helmut so he had to remove the gloves to pick it up off the mats ( yuck) to put it back in.
customer_reviews.author: William Schwentner

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my boxing sparring. This was really comfortable to breathe during sparr and I even did not bothered by mouth guard during beat up by partner.
customer_reviews.author: YOON CHUNG

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: dipped in hot hot water for less than 3 seconds, popped in my mouth and pushed to shape. Stopped biting my lip at night. Keep next to my night table and put in before bed. .
customer_reviews.author: kla8496

customer_reviews.title: An excellent experience
customer_reviews.text: The mouth guard was easy to mold to my mouth and because it's not rigid plastic, it is very comfortable. I took it out of the boiling water at the very moment it started to curl so didn't have any trouble with it. I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: bridgemaven

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Champ at the bit
customer_reviews.text: Quick & easy to mold(to fit). There’s no taste of any kind. I use these to keep from grinding my teeth at night. Much cheaper & just as effective as the “professional dentists approved, blah, blah”.
customer_reviews.author: sdpup

customer_reviews.title: not the best
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son. It was comfortable to him and it didn't mold much, if any, after following instructions. He wore it once and didn't wear it anymore because of the discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: yolanda

customer_reviews.title: These do the Job
customer_reviews.text: My dentist keeps telling me that I grind my teeth at night. I am not entirely convinced that I am. However, as a precaution I wanted to try one of these. It does the job and since it is not too big and it molds to your teeth , you soon get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Sense2k

customer_reviews.title: Made the easy choice the first time.
customer_reviews.text: This product is being used for motorcycling and skiing, to protect the investment of my teeth! Fitting requires to follow instructions very carefully (package comes with two pieces, in case you mess up) and result is comfy and well-formed. Even good for small mouths like mine!
customer_reviews.author: S. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great value, easy to mold, comfortable, case and directions included!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for - something just like what I had in high school to play girls lacrosse, but more comfortable - nothing too fancy. Boil water, remove from boil, dip mouth guard, count to 7, dip in ice water, mold to mouth! I actually cut mine after molding it once and remolded - it is a perfect fit! I Coach middle school so I ordered 2 packs so I have 3 extras on hand in case any of my girls forget theirs. The cost made it easy to foot the bill! I highly recommend this product - it is very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: AshLax

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I loved the fact of how easy it was to fit it to my daughters mouth. Took seconds to form it. Fits perfectly and the gavt it has an option where you can trim if necessary was a seller for me.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Bush

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great value
customer_reviews.text: Mouth guard works great. I use it to stop grinding my teeth at night. Easy to mold to your mouth by boiling water. Great quality and great value. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't live up to the manufacturers Description.
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy after heating up according to directions. Did not contract against tease as led to believe. Wouldn't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Great quality and Safe
customer_reviews.text: I love it, I have braces and I play basketball so a mouth guard was definitely needed. I thought I would mess up if I tried customizing it but it was easy and fits in perfectly. Comes with 2 in case you mess up the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Abdalla

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get properly formed, but otherwise fine
customer_reviews.text: Pain in the ass to get properly formed, even following the instructions with precision. You’re likely to ruin the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Ben J.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with broken case.
customer_reviews.text: Just received mouth pieces , 1 day late (ordered prime and arrived in 3 days, rather than 2 as advertised) and the case is broken. We have yet to try the actual mouth pieces. I'm for better results. I will update review after we try the molds.
customer_reviews.author: EAN

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well
customer_reviews.text: Terrible unless you use it for a night guard. Trimmed to spec and was too loose for my liking. Invest in a suitable mouth guard.
customer_reviews.author: "Mike's Tackle Box" on YouTube

customer_reviews.title: Mouth protector
customer_reviews.text: Very good product for what you pay. All of my expectations were met and the guard feels safe and secure while also protected.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: The clear teeth guards make them nearly invisible from a few feet. They are comfortable enough that the kids wear them willingly.
customer_reviews.author: R A Larson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: This is what both mouth guards turned into after 5 seconds. I booked water, let the water sit for 2 minutes, then put the guards into the water, I counted to 5 seconds and this is what happened.
customer_reviews.author: chris west

customer_reviews.title: Met our expectations
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to our mischievous dog, my daughter's retainer needed to be replaced. But because of the pandemic, our orthodontist can't see her right now. So this was a temporary fix, and is working well. The directions were clear and we had no trouble fitting. We didn't need to trim it (mentioned as a possibility in the directions). The product met our expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte A.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good after fitment
customer_reviews.text: Once molded this mouth guard is very comfortable according to my 8-year old son. Better than the old one (from Wilson). Just follow the instructions very carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Serge Turanov

customer_reviews.title: Great for jaw clenching
customer_reviews.text: Working for my night clenching at a very little cost compared to my dentist mouthguard.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Gemar

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Wow was so not sure about these Because price was so low but to my surprise I followed instructions and it fits perfect and secure
customer_reviews.author: Trixi Huth

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: I feel like the picture makes the product look much thinner than it is. It's quite bulky, which is expected and is good for a mouth guard. I like that it comes with two of the molds so if you mess up on the first one or lose it you can have a back up
customer_reviews.author: Lillygml

customer_reviews.title: Good protection
customer_reviews.text: What I like about the mouth guard is that is easy to mold into your mouth with minimal instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Gatito

customer_reviews.title: I wish I tried it sooner
customer_reviews.text: My mouth prefers the softness of this product over the very expensive dentists ones.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro J.

customer_reviews.title: and said they fit fine. I like that it came with a case ...
customer_reviews.text: These did the job for my son's sport. He got them customized for his mouth, and said they fit fine. I like that it came with a case to store it in. Also, there were 2 in the package, so if he grows he can customize the 2nd one.
customer_reviews.author: thrifty shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good mouth piece!
customer_reviews.text: Just like mouth pieces from the 70's, but strapless. Came with an extra that I forgot about. Case is pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Burgos

customer_reviews.title: Unable to fit properly
customer_reviews.text: My son has had many mouthguards in the past and wanted the clear ones so we got these. We were unable to get either one of them to fit after molding them. We ended up throwing them away. They were too loose. He is a 5’9” 13 year old. And has used adult guards in the past that work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely re-order!
customer_reviews.text: Recommend this set of sport mouth guards (2 included), especially for those who wear braces. Fits both my 11 and 13 year old. Easy to mold and comfortable according to my kiddies. Like the case that came with it, only wish it came with two! Best mouth piece I have bought so far. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: NicZip

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mold. After cutting away back to fit my mouth it works great. I can also talk well with the piece in.
customer_reviews.author: JamesL

customer_reviews.title: Teeth clencher at ease!
customer_reviews.text: I am a constant teeth clencher at night! This is the best mouth gard I’ve had! Super comfortable and very easy to mold! I will buy again if the ones I have get damaged in any way!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Warneckr

customer_reviews.title: Fear of a molten mouth is not necessary
customer_reviews.text: Brian Regan has a great bit about using a mounthpiece and making it fit by putting a molten lava piece in your mouth to form it. I followed the instructions and got a great fit the first time and did not burn my mouth to do it.
customer_reviews.author: James Goedicke

customer_reviews.title: Good even with braces
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter who plays high school basketball, great mouth guard, even with braces.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mold, excellent fit. I use it as a night guard and find that it works FAR BETTER than those you can buy at the drug store costing from $30 to $50.
customer_reviews.author: RichinNC

customer_reviews.title: Holds the brace well.
customer_reviews.text: It has been really a problem to find mouth-guard for my 12 yrs daughter since she had the brace on. She plays taekwondo sparring and this is used for training and tournament. We just put it in the boiling water for less time ( 5-7 seconds I believe) then let her put it on. It remolds just holding on the brace and gum but not very tight to press it.
customer_reviews.author: Jingjing

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Total waste of money. Practically melts during the boil and bite fitting process. Spend a few bucks more and buy a more substantive mouthguard and case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think this product is well made and easy to deal with but I also think it is ...
customer_reviews.text: I think this product is well made and easy to deal with but I also think it is more geared toward sports. I really need it for sleeping and it is too bulky for that.
customer_reviews.author: sariego

customer_reviews.title: Plastic ledge too high
customer_reviews.text: Got for kid to protect teeth at sparring. The side of the guards are too high and dig into gum.
customer_reviews.author: ShopperLife

customer_reviews.title: Easy to mold to mouth and functions well.
customer_reviews.text: Used for mountain biking. It is easy to mold to mouth and useful for its intended purpose, used during mountain biking.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Leckey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to form fit
customer_reviews.text: Great for a night guard, easy to custom fit in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: S. O'

customer_reviews.title: Too big...
customer_reviews.text: Too big for my fairly small mouth; hurt my jaw after less than 20 min of wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Farr

customer_reviews.title: Easy to mold, not as bulky, clear (as advertised)
customer_reviews.text: Great mouth guard. Packaging was great compared to another set of clear mouth guards that I purchased. Easy to mold, fit is comfortable, can speak properly with the mouth guard in. And most importantly, the mouth guard is actually clear unlike the clutch performance mouth guard. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: oliver s.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit...
customer_reviews.text: The best for the price....i have purchased several for my 2 son's who each play 2 different sports where they need mouth guards from sporting good stores and each time they complained of it not fitting right or that it was gagging them but finally we tried teeth armour and perfect fit for them both I will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Cherri~pi

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality Mouth Guard
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality mouth guard. It was easy to mold and fits well. Added bonus that it comes with two guards and a sturdy carry case. My son wears this guard for basketball and it has a low profile and is not at all bulky. Will absolutely recommend and purchase again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Megan T.

customer_reviews.title: Fit my needs perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I bought it due to over sensitive gums that kept me from walking my dog in cold weather. The mouthpiece conforms so well to my mouth that I can talk while wearing it and it keeps the cold out, so no mouth pain.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Easy to mold and use
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to mold to your mouth for a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance Trieu

customer_reviews.title: Bit hard but works still
customer_reviews.text: Needed something with my braces and for MMA classes. IT works. I am using it every class. Bit hard to close mouth and stuff. But then I have braces.
customer_reviews.author: Atlantan

customer_reviews.title: Works well for 11 year old when trimmed
customer_reviews.text: These come with very detailed instructions on how to mold them. I trimmed mine down since they are for my 11 year old and we followed the directions. These are not as bulky as some of the other mouth guards you get from sporting good stores or on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lmiller

customer_reviews.title: Also because of the bending of the clear gel it makes it look like my front teeth extend longer than the other
customer_reviews.text: There is no insurance on this mouth guard which is a big downfall. I have bought a $7 mouth guard from Walmart and it had dental insurance. Also because of the bending of the clear gel it makes it look like my front teeth extend longer than the other. I don’t really trust it for boxing and that was the main purpose I bought it. I will say it is pretty easy to talk with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy to mold!
customer_reviews.text: Very durable material. I was able to size both very easy. The quality that it’s made from is great, and so far I’ve bad a better night sleep after using these. Would definitely recommend! And buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Micaela

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I had read the reviews saying to be careful with the sides caving in while boiling. They did on us. We pulled the sides off and it left rough places that irritate the gums. I don't know if there is anything you could do to keep the sides from caving in.
customer_reviews.author: AleahGentry

customer_reviews.title: Good product for orthodontics
customer_reviews.text: The fitting process takes some trial and error but otherwise, these are perfect for my braces.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Onotracy

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with hot water
customer_reviews.text: Easy to make, gets the job done for the price
customer_reviews.author: Aubyn Allen

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend for sports
customer_reviews.text: It is flimsy and more of a dental tray for whitening. It does not effectively protect teeth for sports. It could be used at night guard to limit grinding.
customer_reviews.author: Vito

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast. Easy directions to follow. Was able to trim them for a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: well made and easy to mold. My son states they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: daph07

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Stays in the mouth and you can close your mouth. When speaking it moves a lot and sometimes try to slip out. All In all I'm satisfied with this product. 2 for 1. Follow instructions for best results
customer_reviews.author: tremayne

customer_reviews.title: Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who is a quarterback (high school). Very tight fit. He is able to keep the mouth guard in and call the plays in the huddle.
customer_reviews.author: TRW

product_meta.title: Professional Sport Mouth Guards- 2 Pack - No BPA - Safe Clear Color - No Color Additive - Athletic Teeth Mouth Guards - Fit Any Mouth Size - Custom Fit - Free carrying case included
feature_bullets: Custom Fit To Any Mouth Size: Teeth Mouth Guard easily molds to fit any tooth shape and mouth size
Precision Fitting Material: Provides optimal retention and Comfort
Maximum Teeth Protection: Thick Cushioning base to absorb shock
Safety Grade: BPA and Latex free highest quality material. NO COLOR additives used. This is a Clear Sport Mouth Guard

2 PACK: Includes 2 Sport Mouth Guards. Also includes a FREE vented carrying case. Designed for all sports and athletes. Great for all sports including; Football, Soccer, Boxing, MMA, Basketball, Lacrosse, Muay Thai, Hockey, Weight Lifting, Wrestling, Jitsu, and Jiu Jitsu
